combo_teaching.title: Rover: <color=#d4bf5f>Basic Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Perform up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc damage</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Rover - <color=#d4bf5f>Mid-air Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Consume STA to cast a Plunging Attack mid-air, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Rover: <color=#d4bf5f>Heavy Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Consume STA to attack the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>. Within a short time after casting Heavy Attack, cast Basic Attack to trigger Basic Attack Stage 4.

combo_teaching.title: Rover: <color=#d4bf5f>Resonance Skill</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Condense sounds into blades, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc damage</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Rover: <color=#d4bf5f>Forte Circuit</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: When "Umbra" is full, hold <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> to cast <color=Highlight>Devastation</color>, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>, considered as Heavy Attack DMG. Enter <color=Highlight>Dark Surge</color> state after casting <color=Highlight>Devastation</color>. Under this state: <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> is replaced with enhanced Basic Attack, performing up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Rove: <color=#d4bf5f>Forte Circuit</color> Tutorial: Heavy Attack
combo_teaching.description: During <color=Highlight>Dark Surge</color>, use <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> after casting <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color> to cast the Chain Heavy Attack on the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>, considered as Heavy Attack DMG. Use <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> after casting Chain Heavy Attack to cast enhanced Basic Attack 3.

combo_teaching.title: Rover: <color=#d4bf5f>Forte Circuit</color> Tutorial: Resonance Skill
combo_teaching.description: Condense sounds into blades, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc damage</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Rover: <color=#d4bf5f>Resonance Liberation</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Gather sounds in the palm to attack targets in the front, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc damage</color>.
